entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 1:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -43.2°C
Wind: NNW 20 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h near noon. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:44 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 51 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:44 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
